meaningMnemonic: You meet a <radical>woman</radical> from another <radical>clan</radical> under the rising <radical>sun</radical> to prepare for <kanji>marriage</kanji>. Your clan and her clan are standing together as the two of you watch the sun rise together.
readingMnemonic: For the <kanji>marriage</kanji> to be official, you need to wait for a <reading>con</reading>dor (こん) to appear. If it doesn't show up before the sun goes down again, the marriage was a failure. You have to try again tomorrow with a different woman.
